lu.itrust.adtop.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • lu.itrust.adtop.controller.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImportController, IndexController, MainController, MenuController, ResultController, StartAnalysisController, TreeController

    public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Class abstract Controller contains similar methods between controllers enabling a screen, setting visible a button or text managed in this class
    Author:
    ersagun
